items.sentence: You should've seen the look on Tom's face when I told him about what Mary did.
Advanced learners of a language would usually get the gist but not the quirks.
Whoever the pitcher may be, he will not be able to strike out our best hitter.
Tom got cavities because he ate candy all the time and didn't brush his teeth.
Tom ran to class with a textbook in one hand and a cup of coffee in the other.
It's not only today that we have to be here. We have to be here tomorrow, too.
If you arrive home before me, please feel free to have a few drinks and relax.
At that time, Tom didn't know Mary was the one he'd eventually get married to.
Saving energy can reduce the emission of greenhouse gases into the atmosphere.
I don't think that you need to tell Tom what Mary said that she's going to do.
